sections.title: Highlighting on Mobile
sections.description: You can now highlight text on mobile and use the previously desktop-only highlight popup! This includes the ability to copy a link, ask a question, and save a bookmark!

sections.title: Minor Rules Updates
sections.description: As we've been "playtesting" the Experience Market, I've been finding issues with usability and wording so I have been updating that as I go and as we find them (thank you Mary and Vyx).
